story_parts.text: Once upon a time, a lion went to the city. He was so excited to see all the tall buildings and busy people. He walked around for a while, taking everything in. Suddenly, he heard a loud noise. It was a fire truck! He watched as it raced down the street with its sirens blaring. He was so fascinated by everything he saw in the city.
next_options: The lion continues to explore the city and sees many more interesting things
The lion gets scared by the noise and runs away
story_parts.selected_option: The lion continues to explore the city and sees many more interesting things

story_parts.text: The lion continues to explore the city and sees many more interesting things. He sees a man in a suit walking down the street and wonders what he does. He sees a woman carrying a baby and wonders what it would be like to have a family. He sees a cat walking on a leash and wonders what it would be like to be domesticated. The lion continues to explore the city until it is time to go home.
next_options: The lion goes home to his family
The lion stays in the city and becomes the king of the jungle
